battle_mage.name: Battlemage
battle_mage.description: Sanctioned mages can bring down a hail of arcane fire upon their foes or protect their allies with magical protection.

battle_mage_horse.name: Battlemage on Warhorse
battle_mage_horse.description: For increased mobility some mages ride on top of barded warhorses.

battle_mage_unicorn.name: Battlemage on Unicorn
battle_mage_unicorn.description: Sometimes a potent prodigy is able to conjure mythical beasts like unicorns, riding with them into battle.

warrior_priest.name: Warrior-Priest
warrior_priest.description: During these times of darkness monasteries teach their clergy to wield hammer and faith to crush unholy foes.

warrior_priest_horse.name: Warrior-Priest on Warhorse
warrior_priest_horse.description: Barded warhorses allow for a priest to quickly traverse the battlefield to bring justice to far away foes.

warrior_priest_tundra.name: Warrior-Priest on Tundra Beast
warrior_priest_tundra.description: Priests of the cold north chant litanies of endurance and hate, inciting their allies and mount to shred their foes to pieces.

captain.name: Captain
captain.description: Captains are inspiring generals and well-trained fighters.

captain_horse.name: Captain on Warhorse
captain_horse.description: A captain of the Human Kingdoms who inspires his troops from horseback.

captain_gryphon.name: Captain on Gryphon
captain_gryphon.description: A captain of the Human Kingdoms flying across the battlefield atop a terrifying beast.

captain_pegasus.name: Captain on Pegasus
captain_pegasus.description: A captain of the Human Kingdoms flying across the battlefield atop a beatiful beast.

noble_lord.name: Noble Lord on Warhorse
noble_lord.description: Nobles of the great houses are well trained and equipped, striding into battle among their personal armies.

noble_gryphon.name: Noble Lord on Gryphon
noble_gryphon.description: Nobles of the great houses are well trained and equipped, some even ride on massive gryphons into battle.

spirit_guardian.name: Spirit Guardian
spirit_guardian.description: A once forgotten knight who has returned to defend the great human kingdoms.

militia.name: Militia
militia.description: A cobbled together force of peasants, drafted into war or defending their home.

cossacks.name: Cossacks
cossacks.description: The Northern peoples have special, and often deadly, militia at their disposal.

men_at_arms.name: Men-at-arms
men_at_arms.description: The human kingdoms have a standing army, training every day for war.

bowmen.name: Bowmen
bowmen.description: A unit of trained bowmen, firing at advancing enemies from afar.

streltsy.name: Royal Marksmen
streltsy.description: The royal guard of the northern kingdoms, these veteran marksmen scythe through their foes with each polearm swing and gun volley.

pistoliers.name: Mounted Pistoliers
pistoliers.description: Light-medium cavalry capable at both range and close quarters.

honor_guard.name: Honor Guard
honor_guard.description: Indomitable defenders of the royalty, both clad in and wielding some of the finest steel available.

realm_knights.name: Realm Knights
realm_knights.description: Those who can afford better equipment and are of noble blood march united into battle.

samurai.name: Samurai
samurai.description: Oathbound foot knights of the eastern realms.

realm_knights_horse.name: Realm Knights on Warhorses
realm_knights_horse.description: Those who can afford a warhorse and are of noble blood ride united into battle.

realm_knights_gryphon.name: Realm Knights on Gryphons
realm_knights_gryphon.description: Gryphons are mighty creatures and are often being mounted by noble knights.

realm_knights_tundra.name: Realm Knights on Tundra Beasts
realm_knights_tundra.description: The Northmen live in sync with the great monsters that roam their lands, from ferocious bears to mythical savages.

realm_knights_pegasus.name: Realm Knights on Pegasi
realm_knights_pegasus.description: The winged Pegasi let their riders strike at any moment.

paladin_pegasus.name: Paladin on Pegasi
paladin_pegasus.description: A holy warrior on a winged steed is a terrifying foe, capable of quite literally delivering retribution from on high.

paladin_horse.name: Paladins on Warhorses
paladin_horse.description: Mounted on the strongest and fastest horses of the realms, crushing enemy resistance.

paladin.name: Paladins
paladin.description: Heavily armored and blessed by their faith, they face any threat with honor.

desert_raiders.name: Desert Raiders
desert_raiders.description: Fast-moving cavalry, experts in navigating the deserts of the south.

cannon.name: Cannon
cannon.description: A large blackpowder weapon that fires heavy cannonballs.

rocket_artillery.name: Rocket Battery
rocket_artillery.description: A powerful artillery piece that fires barrages of explosive rockets.

volley_gun.name: Volley Gun
volley_gun.description: Multiple small cannons attached to a frame, firing in unison to blanket an area in ordnance.

mortar.name: Mortar
mortar.description: A siege weapon that lobs heavy explosives or masonry over high arcs.

heavy_mortar.name: Heavy Mortar
heavy_mortar.description: A larger more powerful mortar, capable of battering down even the mightiest of defences.

light_tank.name: Light Tank
light_tank.description: A steam-driven war wagon capable of decimating anything in its path.

heavy_volley_gun.name: Heavy Volley Gun
heavy_volley_gun.description: A more powerful volley gun for devastating massed formations.

human_kingdoms_tactics.name: Battlefield Commands
human_kingdoms_tactics.description:
When this unit is activated, choose up to X friendly _Infantry_ units within 6" to receive one of the following bonuses until the end of the round: 
 * Re-roll failed Accuracy tests of 9+ 
 * Re-roll failed Strength tests of 9+

hussar_wings.name: Hussar Wings
hussar_wings.description: Enemy units within 6" have -1 to their Courage stat if this unit made a charge in this turn.

polymorph.name: Polymorph
polymorph.description: Target enemy unit within 12" loses 1 attack.

rune_of_power.name: Rune of Power
rune_of_power.description: The next power cast this turn has +1 to its Charge value.

arcane_volley.name: Arcane Volley
arcane_volley.description: Target enemy unit within 24" takes 3 hits with AP(0).

strategies.name: Advanced Armory
strategies.flavor: The human kingdoms possess some of the greatest forges in the lands, forging high-grade weapons for their soldiers.
strategies.description: Use before an _Infantry_ unit fights. Hit rolls of 1 or 2 gain +1 AP.

strategies.name: Optimization
strategies.description: Use before shooting with a unit. Add 3" to the short and long ranges of all weapons for that unit.
strategies.flavor: An engineer in a unit of marksmen can quickly calculate range, wind speed and projectile arcs to maximize long range efficency.

strategies.name: Standing Orders
strategies.description: Use when a unit Shoots. That unit gets +1 Accuracy if it did not move this round.
strategies.flavor: When standing still units have more time to aim and fire at a target.
